locale.name: en_US
locale.message: This plugin provides raw XML data in METS format for a specified journal. NOTE: This is intended to be used by Web Services and enabling this plugin has a security issue in that it provides unrestricted access to the journal in XML form (content is base64 encoded).
Unable to export journal data. The METS Gateway plugin needs to be enabled and the id of the journal to exported must be provided in the URL.
Use base64 encoding for content wrapper
Use URL of the bitsream for content wrapper
